name: TwoCups Sprint 5 - Gem Economy Polish
description: Enhance gem visuals, animations, and displays to make earning gems feel more rewarding

decisions.D1_Animation: Use React Native Reanimated or Animated API for smooth animations
decisions.D2_Design: Gems should feel valuable - sparkle effects, satisfying sounds optional
decisions.D3_Scope: Focus on visual polish, not changing gem economy rules

userStories.title: Gem Earned Animation
userStories.description: Show animated gem(s) floating up when user earns gems from logging or acknowledging.
acceptanceCriteria: When logging attempt: show +1 or +2 gem animation
When acknowledging: show +3 gem animation
Gems float upward and fade out
Animation plays near the action that triggered it
Animation duration ~1-2 seconds
Different gem colors for different amounts (optional)

userStories.title: Gem Counter Component Redesign
userStories.description: Improve the gem counter display on HomeScreen to be more visually appealing.
acceptanceCriteria: Gem icon with count displayed prominently
Counter animates when value changes (count up effect)
Shows both players' gem counts clearly
Gem icon has subtle sparkle or glow effect
Responsive sizing for different screen sizes

userStories.title: Gem Summary in Toast Notifications
userStories.description: Enhance toast notifications to prominently display gem rewards.
acceptanceCriteria: Log attempt toast shows gem icon + amount earned
Request fulfillment toast shows bonus gem indicator
Acknowledge toast shows '+3 gems to you, +3 gems to partner'
Gem icon in toast matches app gem design
Toast styling emphasizes the gem reward

userStories.title: Daily Gem Earnings Summary
userStories.description: Show how many gems user has earned today on HomeScreen.
acceptanceCriteria: Display 'Today: +X gems' below total gem count
Resets at midnight local time
Shows breakdown: 'X from logging, Y from acknowledgments' (optional)
Encouraging message if gems earned today (e.g., 'Great job!')
Different message if no gems yet today

userStories.title: Gem Milestone Celebrations
userStories.description: Celebrate when users hit gem milestones (100, 500, 1000, etc.).
acceptanceCriteria: Detect when gem count crosses milestone threshold
Show celebration modal/overlay for milestones
Celebration includes milestone badge/icon
Message acknowledges achievement (e.g., '500 gems! You're crushing it!')
Only triggers once per milestone (track in user doc)

userStories.title: Gem Leaderboard (Couple View)
userStories.description: Fun comparison view showing gem earnings between partners.
acceptanceCriteria: Section on HomeScreen or Settings showing both partners' gems
Visual bar chart comparing gem counts
Playful messaging (not competitive, encouraging)
Shows who's 'ahead' with fun label (e.g., 'Gem Champion this week')
Option to view weekly or all-time comparison

userStories.title: Gem History Log
userStories.description: Detailed log of all gem transactions for transparency.
acceptanceCriteria: Accessible from Settings or gem counter tap
Shows each gem earning event with timestamp
Entry shows: amount, reason (logged attempt, acknowledged, request fulfilled)
Links to the relevant attempt if applicable
Paginated list (load 20 at a time)
Running total displayed
